content: deltarune the original starwalker crochet pattern by selachiihook/zorashark difficulty ★★☆☆☆ materials ● 40 g medium yarn in yellow ● polyester fiberfill or other stuffing material ● 4 0 mm crochet hook size g ● stitch marker scrap yarn or other means of tracking the round ● yarn needle ● scissors ● needle and thread ● white felt for the eyes or crocheted eyes do what you gotta do tho ● optional - pipe cleaner/wire to allow it to stand about this pattern this pattern is written using us english terms you may use any yarn and hook you like but it will directly impact the shape and size of the project please adjust the hook size for your yarn as not all yarns are created equal in general try to go at least one or two hook sizes smaller than is recommended by the yarn s packaging this pattern is beginner friendly though some sewing is required if you do not feel comfortable using a needle and thread to attach the eyes they can be glued on as the creator of this pattern i wish to stress that this is strictly for personal usage stitch abbreviations slip_stitch = slip_stitch each decrease in this pattern except the chain = chain blo round is only worked in the front single_crochet = single_crochet loops this is done to reduce visible holes blo = back loops only between stitches increase = increase/2sc in stitch the beginning chain/turning chain is not decrease = decrease/2sctog counted as a stitch 3sctog = 3 single_crochet together this pattern is worked into one continuous m circle = magic_ring/magic loop spiral it is strongly recommended that you * x * = repeat action x times use a stitch marker to keep track of the y = number of stitches in round beginning of each round diagrams for rem = remaining certain steps can be found on pages 4-5 legs and
